note.p: Brewers at Farnborough, Beckenham, Kent. Founded by John Fox (1786/7–1861); his sons were John Woodhams Fox and Thomas Samuel Fox. They opened the Oak Brewery in Farnborough in 1836, and the business continued until 1909.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1606/328/33)
